document_data.name: Perd Dellmon
document_data.mainbody: '''Perd Dellmon''' was a farmer during the [[Elemental Evil]] crisis.
document_data.Activitivies: Perd helped his father [[Kerbin Dellmon]] manage a great farm in the valley.
document_data.History: In [[1491 DR]], the [[Iceshield]] [[orc]]s attacked many farms around the property. However, Kerbin refused to abandon his farm and go to [[Yartar]] and Perd supported his decision, despite fearing for his children. With the lucky arrival of some adventurers, the Dellmons managed to defend the farm.
